info.author: Yuhang(Steven) Wang
info.description: "Plt" is designed to make it easy to use matplotlib to plot scientific figures without the knowledge of python. The current implementation will make use of a JSON configuration file.
info.name: plt
info.summary: "plt" let people to use matplotlib without the knowledge of python
info.html_description: “Plt” is designed to make it easy to use matplotlib to plot scientific figures without the knowledge of python. The current implementation will make use of a JSON configuration file.
